SELECT (case when ISNULL(sum(bepaidorders+paidorders)) then 0 else sum(bepaidorders+paidorders) end) AS orders, (case when ISNULL(sum(bepaidorders)) then 0 else sum(bepaidorders) end) AS unpayedcount, (case when ISNULL(sum(paidorders)) then 0 else sum(paidorders) end) AS payedcount, (case when ISNULL(sum(bepaidmoney)) then 0 else sum(bepaidmoney) end) AS bepaidmoney, (case when ISNULL(sum(paidmoney)) then 0 else sum(paidmoney) end) AS payedmoney, (case when ISNULL(sum(paidmoney+bepaidmoney)) then 0 else sum(paidmoney+bepaidmoney) end) as incomemoney, (case when ISNULL(sum(diffmoney)) then 0 else sum(diffmoney) end) as diffmoney, (case when ISNULL(sum(cancelmoney)) then 0 else sum(cancelmoney) end) as cancelmoney, (case when ISNULL(sum(couponmoney)) then 0 else sum(couponmoney) end) as couponmoney, (case when ISNULL(sum(paidmoney+bepaidmoney+diffmoney)) then 0 else sum(paidmoney+bepaidmoney+diffmoney) end) as ordersmoney FROM op_indexorderstatistics WHERE status = 1 AND type = #{type}

SELECT (case when ISNULL(sum(bepaidorders+paidorders)) then 0 else sum(bepaidorders+paidorders) end) AS orders, (case when ISNULL(sum(paidmoney+bepaidmoney+diffmoney)) then 0 else sum(paidmoney+bepaidmoney+diffmoney) end) as ordersmoney FROM op_indexorderstatistics WHERE status = 1 AND type = #{type} AND starttime >= DATE(#{starttime}) AND endtime <= DATE(#{endtime})
